long_description: The women's REI Fleet Quarter-Zip top is designed to keep you comfortable when you're running and working out. Breathable fabric dries fast so you won't feel chilled when a breeze kicks up; antimicrobial finish helps reduce odors. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection; thumbhole cuffs let you extend sleeves for added coverage. Long front zip allows ventilation adjustment; mesh inserts along back also enhance ventilation. Secure zip pocket on sleeve includes a cord port. Reflective trim increases visibility in low light. Flat seams minimize chafing; ergonomic seam placement lets you move comfortably. The women's REI Fleet Quarter-Zip top offers an active fit that moves with you.
short_description: The women's REI Fleet Quarter-Zip top is designed to keep you comfortable when you're running and working out.
